markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Prachalla](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2093)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 37

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 10">[Prachalla](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2093)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Construct" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=35" />
<trait label="Soulbound" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=237" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #183: Field of Maidens](/Sources.aspx?ID=145) pg. 51</row>

**Perception** +19; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +21, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +18, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +23, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +21

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +7

**Con** +5

**Int** +2

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Personality Fragments** A soulbound doll shares fragments of the donor's soul personality, though none of that creature's memories. The Prachalla doll is animated by the soul of a spy who worked for an organized crime ring in Kaer Maga; she was working undercover as a maid when she died.

**Items**
soul focus gem in her back worth 150 gp

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 30 

**Fort** +19 

**Ref** +22 

**Will** +16 

</row>

**HP** 205

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poisoned](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Weaknesses**
bludgeoning 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d8+6 bludgeoning

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 28, attack +20
- **Cantrips (5th)**
[Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229)
- **4th**
[Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Phantasmal Killer](/Spells.aspx?ID=219)
- **5th**
[Crushing Despair](/Spells.aspx?ID=57), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   Prachalla deals an additional 2d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

**Surprise Attack**   On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted are [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to Prachalla.

</column>
name: Prachalla

text: Prachalla Recall Knowledge - Construct (Arcana, Crafting): DC 37 Unspecific Lore : DC 35 Specific Lore : DC 32 Prachalla Source Pathfinder #183: Field of Maidens pg. 51 Perception +19; darkvision Languages Common Skills Acrobatics +21, Society +18, Stealth +23, Thievery +21 Str +0 Dex +7 Con +5 Int +2 Wis +4 Cha +0 Personality Fragments A soulbound doll shares fragments of the donor's soul personality, though none of that creature's memories. The Prachalla doll is animated by the soul of a spy who worked for an organized crime ring in Kaer Maga; she was working undercover as a maid when she died. Items soul focus gem in her back worth 150 gp --- AC 30 Fort +19 Ref +22 Will +16 HP 205 Immunities bleed, death effects, disease, doomed, drained, fatigued, healing, mental, necromancy, nonlethal attacks, paralyzed, poisoned, sickened, unconscious Weaknesses bludgeoning 10 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action fist +23 (Agile, Finesse, Magical), Damage 2d8+6 bludgeoning Occult Innate Spells DC 28, attack +20 - Cantrips (5th) Light, Mage Hand, Prestidigitation - 4th Fly, Phantasmal Killer - 5th Crushing Despair, Harm Sneak Attack Prachalla deals an additional 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures. Surprise Attack On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted are flat-footed to Prachalla.
